Class CosineKittyEquatorialCalculator

Namespace
DataLayer.Implementations
Assembly
DataLayer.dll

Uses the CosineKitty.Astronomy library to perform calculations on celestial objects. Author: Josh Johner Created: SPR 2025

Constructors

CosineKittyEquatorialCalculator()

Used to create a calculator for an observer located at the intersection of the equator and the prime meridian at the J2000 Epoc.

internal CosineKittyEquatorialCalculator()

CosineKittyEquatorialCalculator(double, double, DateTime)

Generates a new converter specific to the observers location and time
